sqlMap.select: select DISTINCT task_list.id as id,task_list.name as name,task_log.total as planTotal, (select count(1) from feed_task_send_log_tbl as task_send_log1 where task_send_log1.task_list_id = task_list.id and task_send_log1.pubdate BETWEEN task_list.regularly_sent_time and date_add(task_list.regularly_sent_time, interval 24 hour)) as day24Count, (select count(1) from feed_task_send_log_tbl as task_send_log2 where task_send_log2.task_list_id = task_list.id and task_send_log2.pubdate BETWEEN task_list.regularly_sent_time and date_add(task_list.regularly_sent_time, interval 48 hour)) as day48Count, (select count(1) from feed_task_send_log_tbl as task_send_log3 where task_send_log3.task_list_id = task_list.id and task_send_log3.pubdate BETWEEN task_list.regularly_sent_time and date_add(task_list.regularly_sent_time, interval 72 hour)) as day72Count, (select count(1) from feed_unique_record_tbl as unique_record where unique_record.type = 1 and unique_record.object_id = task_list.id and pubtime BETWEEN task_list.regularly_sent_time and date_add(task_list.regularly_sent_time, interval 24 hour)) as uac24Count, (select count(1) from feed_unique_record_tbl as unique_record where unique_record.type = 1 and unique_record.object_id = task_list.id and pubtime BETWEEN task_list.regularly_sent_time and date_add(task_list.regularly_sent_time, interval 48 hour)) as uac48Count, (select count(1) from feed_unique_record_tbl as unique_record where unique_record.type = 1 and unique_record.object_id = task_list.id and pubtime BETWEEN task_list.regularly_sent_time and date_add(task_list.regularly_sent_time, interval 72 hour)) as uac72Count, (select count(1) from feed_unique_record_tbl as unique_record where unique_record.type = 1 and unique_record.object_id = task_list.id) as totals from feed_task_list_tbl as task_list inner join feed_task_log_tbl as task_log where (task_list.status = 1 or task_list.status = 2) and task_log.task_list_id = task_list.id
select count(1) from feed_task_list_tbl where (status = 1 or status = 2)
